description: This file defines the NotebooksService class in an Angular application, responsible for managing a list of notebooks including creation, renaming, deletion, and retrieval, with persistence handled via a storage service.

classes.name: NotebooksService
classes.description: Angular service providing functionality to manage notebook entities, including create, rename, delete, and retrieve operations, with internal state stored as a reactive signal.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Initializes the service, loads stored notebooks or seeds with demo notebooks if none are stored.

methods.name: persist
methods.description: Persists the current list of notebooks to storage.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new notebook with a unique ID and current timestamp.

methods.name: rename
methods.description: Renames an existing notebook identified by its ID.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a notebook by its ID.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a notebook by its ID, returning null if not found.

ctags.name: item
ctags.pattern: /^    const item: Notebook = { id: uid('nb_'), name, createdAt: nowIso() };$/
